text: Private Aleksandr Matrosov () is a 1947 Soviet drama movie directed by Leonid Lukov.Кинотеатрам бесплатно предоставят фильмы о Великой Отечественной войнеРядовой Александр Матросов (1947) It stars Anatoliy Ignatyev, Pyotr Konstantinov, and Konstantin Sorokin. == Actors == * Anatoliy Ignatyev as Aleksandr Matrosov * Pyotr Konstantinov as Ivan Chumakov * Konstantin Sorokin as Misha Skvortsov * Shamsi Kiyamov as Khadyn Abdurakhmanov * Lavrenti Masokha as Vasya Petrov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1947 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Lukov
title: Private Aleksandr Matrosov
